# <a name="how-to-remove-autogenerated-columns-from-a-windows-forms-datagridview-control"></a><span data-ttu-id="054dc-102">Cómo: Quitar columnas generadas automáticamente desde un control DataGridView de formularios Windows Forms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="054dc-102">How to: Remove Autogenerated Columns from a Windows Forms DataGridView Control</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="054dc-103">Cuando el control de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> está establecido para generar automáticamente sus columnas en función de los datos de su origen de datos, puede omitir selectivamente determinadas columnas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="054dc-103">When your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to autogenerate its columns based on data from its data source, you can selectively omit certain columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="054dc-104">Para ello, puede llamar al método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> en la colección <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="054dc-104">You can do this by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="054dc-105">Como alternativa, puede ocultar las columnas de la vista estableciendo la propiedad <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> en `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="054dc-105">Alternatively, you can hide columns from view by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="054dc-106">Esta técnica es útil si desea mostrar las columnas ocultas en determinadas condiciones o si necesita tener acceso a los datos de las columnas sin mostrarla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="054dc-106">This technique is useful when you want to display the hidden columns in certain conditions, or when you need to access the data in the columns without displaying it.</span></span>  
  
### <a name="to-remove-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="054dc-107">Para quitar columnas generadas automáticamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="054dc-107">To remove autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="054dc-108">Llame al método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> en la colección <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="054dc-108">Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#111)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#111)]  
  
### <a name="to-hide-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="054dc-109">Para ocultar las columnas generadas automáticamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="054dc-109">To hide autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="054dc-110">Establezca la propiedad <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> de la columna en `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="054dc-110">Set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#112)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#112)]

## <a name="compiling-the-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="054dc-112">Compilar el código</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="054dc-112">Compiling the Code</span></span>  
 <span data-ttu-id="054dc-113">Para este ejemplo se necesita:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="054dc-113">This example requires:</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="054dc-114">Un control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> denominado `dataGridView1` enlazado a una tabla que contiene `Fax` y `CustomerID` columnas, como la tabla `Customers` de la base de datos de ejemplo Northwind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="054dc-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control named `dataGridView1` bound to a table that contains `Fax` and `CustomerID` columns, such as the `Customers` table in the Northwind sample database.</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="054dc-115">Referencias a los ensamblados <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType>.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="054dc-115">References to the <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> assemblies.</span></span>
